an4.274:2.1: 28. Rāgapeyyāla
an4.274:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
an4.274:4.4: vedanāsu … pe … citte … pe … dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
an4.274:4.5: Rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti.
